Artifact.name: Google Chat
Artifact.Query: SELECT datetime(topic_messages.create_time/1000000,'unixepoch') AS Message_Time, Groups.name AS Conversation_Name, users.name AS Message_Author, topic_messages.text_body AS Message, topic_messages.reactions AS Message_Reactions, topic_messages.annotation AS Message_Attachment_Annotation FROM topic_messages JOIN users ON users.user_id=topic_messages.creator_id JOIN Groups ON Groups.group_id=topic_messages.group_id ORDER BY Message_Time ASC
